text: Proton: It's getting dark, we'll have to camp outhere for the night.
Proton: Everyone! We're surrounded by Xuirists!
Proton: We've managed to survive the attack, but it seemslike the Xuirists will keep hunting us while we're inNolavillia.
Proton: We should head to Nation as quickly as possible.
???: Could you open the cage I'm stuck in?
Proton: Why are you in that cage?
???: The Xuirists captured me after I escaped from theShadow Realm.
???: I think they were going to sacrifice me.
???: Yeah, I'm something called a "Proto-Xuir", a failedclone of some dimensional called the "True Xuir".
???: I'd stick around, but there's something I haveto do.
???: There are some other Proto-Xuirs that escaped with me,and one of them was captured by the Xuirists.
???: Yeah, it's not like I'm the only one.
Proton: Nolavillia is truly a strange place, to thinkthat there would be so many other Xuirs...
Proton: Sorry, this is my first time in Nolavillia sinceI escaped from the Shadow Realm 20 years ago.
Proton: My engraving says G3 N2.
???: We thought you died years ago.
???: Of course, we don't really remember you sincewe were still young.
Xuirventh: We weren't given names so, Xuirventh isjust a name I made up a few years ago.
Xuirventh: So, what do you go by these days, Xuirond?
Xuirventh: Fancy name, doesn't have to do with numberseither.
Xuirventh: You said you left, Nolavillia, but why did youcome back.
Xuirventh: Two decades later seems like a pretty strange timeto return.
Proton: I'm here to stop the Shadow Realm Research Center.
Proton: The Research Center has recently obtained a powerful itemcalled the Holy Itucher.
Proton: With such power, they could easily end the world.
Xuirventh: If you're heading to the Shadow Realm, you'll need togo to the Nation of Nation.
Xuirventh: But on you're way, you'll likely pass by the XuiristCavern.
Xuirventh: If you want to team up and help me free Xuirfth,I'll probably be able to convince them to help you stopthe Shadow Realm.
Xuirventh: You'll probably have to fight those Xuirists anyways.
Xuirventh: Well, I've gotta go fight some Xuirists.
Scien: The Nation of Nation, the Altar must still stand...
Scien: That person, Xuirventh, they said they escaped fromthe Shadow Realm.
Scien: The only safe place in Nolavillia to hide from the ShadowRealm is in Nation.
Scien: We need to keep going.
Scien: We must retrieve the Itucher before they can destroy Nation andthe rest of the world.
Break: Omega, has the dispatch responded yet?
Omega: It is likely that they have been defeated.
Break: Omega, you do realize that failure will not beaccepted.
Break: If you fail, I will destroy them.
